progress.updatingBanner: Updating the banner on your X profile
progress.updatingBio: Updating your bio on your X profile
progress.rateLimitHit: You have hit a rate limit!

error.failedToGetDeviceInfo: Failed to get saved device info.

updates.shouldUseLatestVersion: You should always use the latest version of Cyd.
updates.installViaPackageManager: Install updates using your operating system's package manager.
updates.errorWithAutomaticUpdate: Error with automatic update. Install the latest version of Cyd
updates.updateAvailableMessage: You are running Cyd {currentVersion}. Cyd {latestVersion} is the latest version, and you should upgrade.
updates.noUpdatesAvailableMessage: You are running Cyd {currentVersion}, which is the latest version.

signIn.title: Sign in to Cyd to access premium features
signIn.openSourceMode: You're using Cyd in open source developer mode, which does not use a server.
signIn.supportProject: If you're not contributing to Cyd, please support the project by paying for a Premium plan.
signIn.subscribeLabel: Opt-in to occasional email updates from the Lockdown Systems collective, the developers of Cyd
signIn.emailPrivacy: Your email address will be used to identify your account. We won't share it or send you unsolicited emails.
signIn.verificationCodeSent: We've emailed you a verification code. Enter it below.

error.signInRestricted: At the moment, sign-ins are restricted to specific people. Sorry!
error.failedToGetDeviceInfo: Failed to get device info. Please try again later.
error.failedToRegisterDevice: Failed to register device. Please try again later.
error.failedToRegisterNewDevice: Failed to register new device. Please try again later.

errorReport.title: Submit an error report
errorReport.sendExtraDetailsDescription: This includes your username, a screenshot of the embedded browser, and other data that could help debug this problem.
errorReport.moreInfoHelpful: The more info you provide, the easier it will be for us to fix.
errorReport.retryQuestion: Do you want to try this step again, or cancel and go back to the dashboard?

error.noDetails: Well this is awkward. I don't seem to have details about your error report. This shouldn't happen.
error.submissionError: Well this is awkward. There's an error submitting your automation error report.

import.lastImportedArchive: You last imported your X archive {timeAgo}.
import.lastBuiltDatabase: You last built your local database from scratch {timeAgo}.
import.needImportForMigration: You'll need to import your local database of tweets before you can migrate them to Bluesky.
import.needImportOrBuild: You'll need to import your local database of tweets, or build it from scratch, before you can delete your tweets or likes, or migrate your tweets to Bluesky.

upsell.thanksForPremium: Thanks for using a Premium plan.
upsell.ifYouLikeToSupport: If you'd like to support us even more, {donation}
upsell.premiumForTeamsQuestion: Would Cyd would be useful for your team? Check out
upsell.andIfYouLikeToSupport: And if you'd like to support us even more,
upsell.waysToSupport: Here are ways to support us:
upsell.premiumDescription: Unlock features like deleting DMs and migrating tweets to Bluesky
upsell.teamsDescription: Get Cyd Premium for everyone at your organization or company
upsell.donateDescription: Show your support by making a donation!

dashboard.localDatabaseDescription: Make or update your local backup of X data. Cyd references this data when you delete from X or migrate to Bluesky.
dashboard.deleteFromXDescription: Delete your tweets, retweets, likes, bookmarks, or DMs from your X account, or unfollow everyone.
dashboard.importXArchiveDescription: Import data from an X archive file to create a backup without logging to X.
dashboard.migrateToBlueskyDescription: Migrate your tweets from your X account to a Bluesky account.
dashboard.tombstoneDescription: Update your X profile to make it clear that you've moved on to better social media sites.

wizard.timeToMoveOn: It's time to move on from X. How can I help you?
